taxonomy.description: Taxonomy key. Must not exceed 32 characters and may only contain lowercase alphanumeric characters, dashes, and underscores.

object_type.description: Object type or array of object types with which the taxonomy should be associated

args.description: Array or query string of arguments for registering a taxonomy.

description.description: A short descriptive summary of what the taxonomy is for.

labels.description: An array of labels for this taxonomy.

public.description: Whether a taxonomy is intended for use publicly either via the admin interface or by front-end users.

publicly_queryable.description: Whether the taxonomy is publicly queryable.

show_ui.description: Whether to generate and allow a UI for managing terms in this taxonomy in the admin.

show_in_menu.description: Whether to show the taxonomy in the admin menu.

show_in_nav_menus.description: Makes this taxonomy available for selection in navigation menus.

show_in_rest.description: Whether to include the taxonomy in the REST API.

rest_base.description: To change the base url of REST API route.

rest_namespace.description: To change the namespace URL of REST API route.

show_tagcloud.description: Whether to list the taxonomy in the Tag Cloud Widget controls.

show_in_quick_edit.description: Whether to show the taxonomy in the quick/bulk edit panel.

show_admin_column.description: Whether to display a column for the taxonomy on its post type listing screens.

meta_box_cb.description: Provide a callback function for the meta box display.

meta_box_sanitize_cb.description: Callback function for sanitizing taxonomy data saved from a meta box.

capabilities.description: Array of capabilities for this taxonomy.

rewrite.description: Triggers the handling of rewrites for this taxonomy.

query_var.description: Sets the query var key for this taxonomy.

update_count_callback.description: Callback function for updating the count of terms.

default_term.description: Default term to be used for the taxonomy.

sort.description: Whether terms in this taxonomy should be sorted.

args.description: Array of arguments to automatically use inside wp_get_object_terms() for this taxonomy.

_builtin.description: This taxonomy is a 'built-in' taxonomy. INTERNAL USE ONLY!
